column3: Social;PHNOM PENH:------ A women working as a cleaner fell from the 2nd floor Bank of Taiwan Co-operative. in  Chao Por Sen Chey district at 10:30 AM on September 26
column7: has been working at the bank for more than a year and has four children
column8: two sons and two daughters.------According to the bank staff
column9: the victim cleaned the bank building and was on the 2nd floor when the floor gave way the victim fell to the ground and was killed.------After the horrific incident
column10: the daughter of the victim was crying and mourning the loss of her mother.------https://postnews.com.kh/local/374219------National News------National News------National News------National News------National News------National News
